MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Kudryavka-kun is a returnee, ergo she isn't very familiar with the Japanese culture yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…正しくは缶拾いだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...She meant picking the cans.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...She meant picking the cans.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ふうん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 訝しげな目で、来ヶ谷さんとクドを交互に見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She eyed Kurugaya-san and Kud in turn with suspicion.
MESSAGE.Translation: She eyed Kurugaya-san and Kud in turn with suspicion.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「クドリャフカがそんな遊びも知らないとは思えないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I can't imagine Kudryavka doesn't even know such a famous game...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I can't imagine Kudryavka doesn't even know such a famous game...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「まあ、いいでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたが言うなら、信じるとしますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...If you say so, it must be true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...If you say so, it must be true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ひとまず現行犯ではないようですしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And we weren't able to catch you people red-handed, anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And we weren't able to catch you people red-handed, anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、キミのそういう実直なところは好きだよ、私は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I like that scrupulous part about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I like that scrupulous part about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「もう少し融通が利くと、なお好感が持てるのだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I would like you even more, though, if you were a little more flexible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I would like you even more, though, if you were a little more flexible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…考えておきましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'll think about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'll think about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「では」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Excuse us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Excuse us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …二木さんは風紀委員を引き連れて去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She walked away alongside the other prefect.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She walked away alongside the other prefect.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「やれやれだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That was close...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That was close...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…もうだいじょぶ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Are they gone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Are they gone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひょい、と教室から葉留佳さんが顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san poked her head out of a classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san poked her head out of a classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえずもう向こういったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, they just left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, they just left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …というところで五時間目五分前のチャイムが鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And then we heard the bell signaling the end of lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then we heard the bell signaling the end of lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「お、もうこんな時間か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, we ran out of time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, we ran out of time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおおおーーっ!!　めちゃくちゃ不完全燃焼じゃねえかぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uohhhhh!! I haven't yet done anything at all!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uohhhhh!! I haven't yet done anything at all!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、これ結構面白かったし、またいつか再戦するか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it was pretty fun. Maybe we should have another game some day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it was pretty fun. Maybe we should have another game some day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, agreed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, agreed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなこういうくだらない遊びのほうが、本気になるみたいだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: They seemed their most serious when it came to this kind of meaningless stuff...
MESSAGE.Translation: They seemed their most serious when it came to this kind of meaningless stuff...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全然野球のこと考えられなかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There was no time whatsoever to think about baseball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There was no time whatsoever to think about baseball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に着いた途端、チャイムが鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell rang right as I arrived at the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell rang right as I arrived at the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よ、助けはいらないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, need any help?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, need any help?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介がまた窓から降りてきたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke appeared; he must have roped down from above like usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke appeared; he must have roped down from above like usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 助言をもらえれば、次の授業中にも考えることが出来そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I should ask him for some advice so I can work out a strategy or two for Saturday's match during the next class.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I should ask him for some advice so I can work out a strategy or two for Saturday's match during the next class.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、任せな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでに準備していたかのように、すらすらと提示してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: As if he was already prepared for it, he quickly threw a plan together.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if he was already prepared for it, he quickly threw a plan together.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「こんな感じでどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How about that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How about that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすがに研究もしてるのか、的確な配置だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He had done his homework; everyone was in appropriate positions.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had done his homework; everyone was in appropriate positions.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう、参考になったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you, it'll be a good reference.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you, it'll be a good reference.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか。じゃ、頑張れよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good, I wish you luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good, I wish you luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は僕の肩を、ぽんと叩いて去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He tapped me on the shoulder and left.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tapped me on the shoulder and left.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まだ悩んでいるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you still at it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you still at it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介がまた窓から降りてきたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke appeared; he must have roped down from above like usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke appeared; he must have roped down from above like usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間がなくなってしまったので、心配してきてくれたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have been worried about me because of how little time I'd had to work on this during lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have been worried about me because of how little time I'd had to work on this during lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、その原因を作ったのは恭介だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He himself was the main reason for that, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He himself was the main reason for that, though.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこまでのプレッシャーをかけた覚えはないんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I didn't mean to put that much pressure on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I didn't mean to put that much pressure on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なかなか難しいもんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Things don't always go the way you plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Things don't always go the way you plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 独り言を言って、去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He left behind those words.
MESSAGE.Translation: He left behind those words.

SELECT.JP: 潜む$d廊下を走り抜ける
SELECT.EN: Take cover in a classroom$dBlaze through the hallway
SELECT.Translation: Take cover in a classroom$dBlaze through the hallway

SELECT.EN: Ask him for help$dTurn down his offer
SELECT.Translation: Ask him for help$dTurn down his offer
